review: This is the coolest device ever! I have a slightly older off brand TV and it still works great. I was even considering buying a gaming console so that it'd be easier to watch my shows without having to hook up and move my laptop every time. Instead of spending a few hundred dollars on that, I can get everything I wanted and more for only $40! Amazon could charge way more for this device and it'd still be worth it. Thank you Amazon for making this so affordable and easy to use! Best purchase ever! Oh and the phone app is great and easy to use also! Heard about it by word of mouth and I will continue to spread the word! :)
author: Coley
